EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.Incomplete Registration 9-18-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Wait, come back! Your SpringOne Platform 2018 registration is incomplete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We noticed that you didn't finish the process of ordering a pass for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-incomplete-registration-2018]]>. Surely you’d hate to miss out on the exclusive content, learning and networking opportunities that SpringOne Platform 2018 has to offer!
Don’t fret—there's still time to register for a conference pass! Simply complete your registration by clicking here <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select]]> to go back to the event page and do just that.
If you run into any trouble with your registration, please email us at platform@pivotal.io <[[mailto:platform@pivotal.io]]> and we’ll get back to you ASAP.
We look forward to seeing you there!
Kathryn Efird from The SpringOne Platform Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
